noResponseError: No response received from server. Please try again.
loadingAdditionalInfo: Please wait while we prepare your content
noLanguageFound: No language found. Would you like to add a new one?
failedToCreateLanguage: Failed to create language. Please try again.
errorCreatingLanguage: An error occurred while creating the language. Please try again.
invalidLanguageCode: Invalid language code. Please use a 2-letter ISO code.
languageAlreadyExists: A language with this code already exists.
confirmLanguageCreation: Are you sure you want to create this language?
languageNameError: Language name must be at least 2 characters long
languageCodeError: Language code must be exactly 2 characters
nativeNameError: Native name must be at least 2 characters long
createLanguageDescription: Add a new language to the system.
languageNameDescription: The full name of the language in English.
languageCodeDescription: The two-letter ISO 639-1 code for the language.
nativeNameDescription: The name of the language in its native form.
